entry.title: Ukraine Says Russia Uses Cargo Ships to Ferry Weapons to Black Sea
entry.content: A shipping line with ties to the Russian Defense Ministry has been carrying arms through the Bosporus to aid Moscow’s war effort, according to Ukrainian officials who have asked Turkey to block the vessels.

entry.title: U.N. Inspectors Reach Russian-Held Nuclear Plant in Ukraine
entry.content: A team from the International Atomic Energy Agency visited the Zaporizhzhia plant despite intense shelling in the area, which Ukraine and Russia blamed on each other.

entry.title: Xinjiang Rights Report Ratchets Up Standoff Between the U.S., China
entry.content: China called the U.N. assessment of possible crimes against humanity in Xinjiang an illegitimate report in a fiery response that underscores Beijing’s deepening geopolitical fissures with Western powers.
